name: Blog Layout Design by Themes Awesome
author: Themes Awesome

sections.description:
Blog Layout Design WordPress Plugin

Blog Layout Design is an awesome plugin that will help You to showcase all of Your blog posts with beautiful layouts.

WHAT YOU WILL GET?

Blog Layout Design allows you to showcase your work on your WordPress website easily. With 200+ Hover Options, 10+ Default Layouts, ready-made templates are ready to make Your WordPress website memorable than before. It will save a lot of money on showcasing blog posts for your website.

Blog Layout Design provides almost everything you need to display a modern, beautiful, and stunning blog layout. With various functions and layout options that keep your website attractive and engaged with the user.

This WordPress blog layout plugin provides customization options that are familiar with WordPress users. After creating the posts showcase, You can insert the showcase anywhere on the website using a shortcode, Elementor, or Gutenberg

Live Demo

Blog Layout Design Features

  • Grid layout
  • Masonry layout
  • Carousel Layout
  • Pagination
  • Number pagination
  • Customize Title Color
  • Customize Facts Color
  • Customize Background Hover Color
  • Customize Button Text Color
  • Customize Button Background Color
  • Customize Button Text Hover Color
  • Customize Button Background Hover Color
  • Customize Loading Background Item
  • Customize Pagination Default Color
  • Customize Pagination Default Background Color
  • Customize Pagination Default Hover Color
  • Customize Pagination Default Background Hover Color
  • Blog Column Option
  • Blog Column on Tablet Option
  • Blog Column on Mobile
  • Blog Padding option
  • Blog Width
  • Blog Height
  • Insert Blog using Elementor block

Learn more about Blog Layout Design Add-on
Advanced Grid
Advanced Masonry
Advanced Carousel
Advanced Slider
Advanced Justified

Get Up and Running in only three steps

  1. Create the post
  2. Create the showcase
  3. Call showcase from Elementor, Gutenberg or Shortcode
sections.faq:
Is there a time period for using Blog Layout Design?

No, you can use Blog Layout Design onwards.

Does it work with any theme?

Absolutely! Blog Layout Design will Works With Any Theme

How do I translate the plugin?

We recommended Loco Translate for translate.for details on how to use it you can read our online documentation.

1.0.5

  • Support slider layout style
  • Fixing minor style bugs

1.0.6

  • Add more justified layout styles
  • Fixing minor style bugs

1.0.7

  • Sanitizing and validating input text
  • Validating output and translate strings
